title: Hopper remote debugging
content: I have hopper on my Mac and work fine for disassemble, now I want to debug an exe file, but I have a problem... with ida you can remote debugging, is there any method where I have hopper on my Mac (client) and start a remote debugger on windows/linux so I can also dynamically debug elf and exe? Thank you.

comments.text: RTFM. If this is not in the manual, this feature is not available.
